title: Chapter 35 from the book of Draaaaven
body:
The Book of the Rift Chapter 35

And the LORD Draven said unto Zilean

1. "Go now, write it on a tablet for them, inscribe it on a scroll, that for the days to come it maybe an everlasting witness. For these are rebellious enemies, deceitful trolls, unwilling to listen to the LORD Draven thy God.

2. They say unto their tank 'Build Randuins!' They say unto their mage 'Build Zhonya's!' They say unto their support "Peel for our ad carry!"

3. They say, 'You are not the LORD, the LORD of ADC, you are merely a fed noob! Do not approach us Draven.' " 

4. Therefore, the Holy One of Noxus says 

5. "Because you have rejected my damage and built randuins, frozen heart and zhonya's hourglass, this sin will come for you. It will come swift and fast, like a high wall cracking and collapsing suddenly in an instant. 

6. I have built last whisper and the Monolith Malphite will no longer stand against me. He will break in pieces like pottery, shattering so mercilessly against me. 

7. Even when he breaks, among the pieces will not a worthy fragment be found."

8. And this is what the Holy One of Noxus, the LORD Draven spoke unto his enemies. And he went before the Monolith at the Lizard Elder and slew him, and he broke in pieces like pottery, shattering before the LORD Draven as it was foretold. 

9. And because of that display of power which the LORD thy God Draven had shown, the enemies fled before him, in weeping and gnashing of teeth, and surrendered their nexus to him.
